Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'vSOSiteMapping' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vSOSiteMapping] GO CREATE VIEW vSOSiteMapping AS select distinct t.companyid, t.OrderNbr,t.OrderType ,s.SiteID from SOOrder t inner join SOLine s on t.CompanyID = s.CompanyID and t.OrderType = s.OrderType and t.OrderNbr = s.OrderNbr
